creator: Hopon Mobility LTD
descriptionHtml:
For the first time in Israel, smart mobile payments for public transit, with HopOn!

Warning - The app requires NFC support. Devices that do not support NFC can pre-order a ticket at www.hopon.co.il
Pre-ordered contract can be charged in a charging station. For a list of all charging station see https://hopon.co.il/charging-stations-map

You can also pay directly on any one of "Dan" buses straight from the app, even if you don't have a Ravkav by scanning the QR bar-code on the bus.

🚲🚲🚲

In cooperation with tel-o-fun you can rent and release bikes from the app! Available in all tel-o-fun stations and takes no more then a few seconds to release bike and be on your way.
Buy all subscriptions - Daily, weekly or yearly, and join the green revolution!

***

At the bottom is a list of 10 most popular smartphone in Israel and their ability to support different types of Rav-Kav

We also want to emphasize that writing on Rav-Kav is a very delicate process, and displacement of Rav-Kav or smartphone cover which is too thick, Non-original battery, wireless charging sticker or anti-radiation sticker can interfere with the success of charging the Rav-Kav.

Galaxy Note4 - Writing supports in few types of Rav Kav
Galaxy S3 - Writing supports in some types of Rav Kav (type OTI 10054127-1, watchdata)
Galaxy S4 - Writing supports in few types of Rav Kav (type OTI 10054127-1, watchdata, ASK TANGO)
Galaxy S5 - Writing supports in most types of Rav Kav(type OTI 10054127-1, watchdata, ASK TANGO , ASK, GEMALTO SP)
Galaxy S6 - Writing supports in few types of Rav Kav
Galaxy S7 - Writing supports in few types of Rav Kav(watchdata, Ask Tango,Ask, gemalto G1 (not support gemalto sp),austriacard, oti 10054127-1)
LG G2 - Writing supports in few types of Rav Kav (type ASK TANGO)
LG G3 - Writing supports in most types of Rav Kav(type watchdata, ASK TANGO)
LG G4 - Writing supports in some types of Rav Kav(type OTI 10054127-1, watchdata, ASK TANGO)
Nexus 5 - Writing supports in few types of Rav Kav
One+One - Writing supports in few types of Rav Kav (type watchdata)

******* The app is currently working only in Israel *******

descriptionShort: Charge your RavKav from your smartphone - The app requires NFC support

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• טעינת כרטיסי רכבת ישירות מהאפליקציה: נכנסים אל מסך הטעינה -> כרטיס רכבת -> בוחרים מוצא ויעד ובוחרים כרטיס לטעינה על גבי הרב-קו לפני ההגעה לתחנה! שימו לב, בשל ההגבלה על מספר הנוסעים, חובה להצטייד מראש בשובר כניסה לרכבת. להנפקת שובר ללא עלות נכנסים לאתר https://www.rail.co.il
• טעינת פיצוי רב-קו עבור ההשבתה בתקופת הקורונה לסטודנטים בעלי מנוי שנתי או סמסטריאלי ונוסעים שרכשו חופשי חודשי בחודש מרץ. פרטים מלאים על הפיצוי באתר https://hopon.co.il.

title: HopOn - charge your RavKav

creator: Hopon Mobility LTD
descriptionHtml:
For the first time in Israel, smart mobile payments for public transit, with HopOn and Rav-Pass!

Topup the Israeli public transit payment card, the Rav-Kav (רב-קו), directly from your phone.
You can choose between credit value that's available to use on buses and trains across Israel, or purchase a daily/weekly/monthly pass for specific service area.
The Rav-Kav top-up service requires your device to have NFC support in order to communicate with the card, but don't worry - if you don't have NFC you still have other options:
• Topup your card in one of our points of sale using cash or credit card. find the nearest seller here -> https://hopon.co.il/charging-stations-map
• Pay directly on any one of "Dan" buses in Tel-Aviv straight from the app, even if you don't have a Ravkav, by scanning the QR bar-code on the bus.
• Join the Beta version of this app, and pay directly from your mobile on all bus rides across Israel using the new Rav Pass (רב פס) service.

🚲🚲🚲

In cooperation with tel-o-fun you can rent and release bikes from the app! Available in all tel-o-fun stations and takes no more then a few seconds to release bike and be on your way. Buy all subscriptions - Daily, weekly or yearly, and join the green revolution!

*The app is currently working only in Israel

Enjoy your ride!
descriptionShort: Topup your RavKav from your smartphone or pay directly with Rav-Pass

• טעינת פיצוי רב-קו עבור ההשבתה בתקופת הקורונה לסטודנטים בעלי מנוי שנתי או סמסטריאלי ונוסעים שרכשו חופשי חודשי בחודש מרץ. פרטים מלאים על הפיצוי באתר https://hopon.co.il.

title: Rav-Pass by HopOn - charge your RavKav

creator: Hopon Mobility LTD
descriptionHtml:
Taking public transit rides has never been easier. Rav-Pass gives you the freedom to choose any way you want to pay for your public transit rides in Israel!

Use the price calculator in the app and find the best payment option for your ride:

Pay directly from your phone no cash and "smart" cards required, just take your phone to your next ride and scan the QR code on board.
With Rav-Pass you can pay for any bus ride in Israel and enjoy daily and monthly discounts without upfront payments. stay tuned, the service will is also coming to Israel railways, Shared taxi, Carmelit and light rail in couple of months.

Need to take a train? Rav-Kav turns out cheaper? Top-up your Rav-Kav with your iPhone. Tap the Rav-Kav card near the camera area on your device (back or front), select the contract you want, pay using all major credit and debit cards. Tap again to complete the topup and you're ready for your next journey!

You can choose between Credit value which is acceptable by all public transit operators in Israel, or a Daily, Weekly and Monthly passes according to the area of your travel.

Rav-Pass is an official public transportation payment app licensed by the Ministry of transportation in Israel.
Rav Kav top up is available on iPhone 7 and above with iOS13+

We'd love to hear your feedback support@ravpass.co.il

Safe journeys,
HopOn Rav-Pass Team

title: Rav-Pass & Rav-Kav by HopOn

creator: Hopon Mobility LTD
descriptionHtml:
Taking public transit rides has never been easier. Rav-Pass gives you the freedom to choose any way you want to pay for your public transit rides in Israel!

Use the price calculator in the app and find the best payment option for your ride:

Pay directly from your phone no cash and "smart" cards required, just take your phone to your next ride and scan the QR code on board.
With Rav-Pass you can pay for any bus ride in Israel and enjoy daily and monthly discounts without upfront payments. You can use the service for your bus rides in Dan, Dan South, Dan North, Dan Beer-Sheva, Egged, Egged Taabura, Metropoline, Superbus, Afikim, Kavim, Nativ Express, UNBS, NTT, Galim & Rama. The service will also becoming to Israel railways, Shared taxi, Carmelit and the light rail in the next couple of months.

Need to take a train? Rav-Kav turns out cheaper? Top-up your Rav-Kav using your phone! Just tap & hold your rav-kav card on the back of your phone, select the contract you want, pay using all major credit and debit cards. tap again to complete the topup and you're ready for your next journey!

You can choose between credit value which is acceptable by all public transit operators in Israel, or a Daily, Weekly and Monthly passes according to the area of your travel.

Rav-Pass is an official public transportation payment app licensed by the Ministry of transportation in Israel.
Rav Kav top up required NFC support on your phone.

We'd love to hear your feedback support@ravpass.co.il

Safe journeys,
HopOn Rav-Pass Team

Use the price calculator in the app and find the best payment option for your ride:

Pay directly from your phone no cash and "smart" cards required, just take your phone to your next ride and scan the QR code on board.
With Rav-Pass you can pay for any bus ride in Israel and enjoy daily and monthly discounts without upfront payments. You can use the service for your Israel Railways train rides, Haifa's Carmelit and bus rides across Israel in Dan, Dan South, Dan North, Dan Beer-Sheva, Egged, Egged Taabura, Metropoline, Superbus, Afikim, Kavim, Nativ Express, UNBS, NTT, Galim & Rama. The service is also coming soon to shared taxis & Jerusalem's light rail and eastern transit operators.

Rav-Kav turns out cheaper? Top-up your Rav-Kav using your phone! Just tap & hold your Rav-kav card on the back of your phone, select the ticket you want, pay using all major credit and debit cards. tap again to complete the topup and you're ready for your next journey!

You can choose between credit value which is acceptable by all public transit operators in Israel, or a Daily, Weekly and Monthly passes according to the area of your travel.

Rav-Pass is an official public transportation payment app licensed by the Ministry of transportation in Israel.
Rav Kav top up required NFC support on your phone.

We'd love to hear your feedback support@ravpass.co.il

Safe journeys,
HopOn Rav-Pass Team
descriptionShort: The official app for public transportation payments in Israel

נוסעים קבוע בתחבורה הציבורית? לאחר אישור הפרופיל תוכלו לטעון לכרטיס הרב-קו האישי שלכם מנוי סמסטריאלי או שנתי לאזור הנסיעות הקבועות שלכם, ותהנו בנוסף מ-50% הנחה בטעינת ערך צבור לנסיעות מזדמנות מחוץ לאזור המנוי!

title: Rav-Pass & Rav-Kav by HopOn רב-פס ורב-קו

creator: Hopon Mobility LTD
descriptionHtml:
Taking public transit rides has never been easier. Rav-Pass gives you the freedom to choose anyway you want to pay for your public transit rides in Israel!

Use the price calculator in the app and find the best payment option for your ride:

Pay directly from your phone no cash and "smart" cards required, just take your phone to your next ride and scan the QR code on board.
With Rav-Pass you can pay for any bus ride in Israel and enjoy daily and monthly discounts without upfront payments. You can use the service for your Israel Railways train rides, Haifa's Carmelit and bus rides across Israel in Dan, Dan South, Dan North, Dan Beer-Sheva, Egged, Egged Taabura, Metropoline, Superbus, Afikim, Kavim, Nativ Express, UNBS, NTT, Galim & Rama. The service is also coming soon to shared taxis & Jerusalem's light rail and eastern transit operators.

Rav-Kav turns out cheaper? Top-up your Rav-Kav using your phone! Just tap & hold your Rav-kav card on the back of your phone, select the ticket you want, pay using all major credit and debit cards. tap again to complete the topup and you're ready for your next journey!

You can choose between credit value which is acceptable by all public transit operators in Israel, or a Daily, Weekly and Monthly passes according to the area of your travel.

Rav-Pass is an official public transportation payment app licensed by the Ministry of transportation in Israel.
Rav Kav top up required NFC support on your phone.

We'd love to hear your feedback support@ravpass.co.il

Safe journeys,
HopOn Rav-Pass Team
descriptionShort: The official app for public transportation payments in Israel

Use the price calculator in the app and find the best payment option for your ride:

Pay directly from your phone no cash and "smart" cards required, just take your phone to your next ride and scan the QR code on board.
With Rav-Pass you can pay for any train & bus ride in Israel and enjoy daily and monthly discounts without upfront payments. You can use the service for your Israel Railways train rides, Haifa's Carmelit & Metronit, Jerusalem light rail and bus rides across Israel with Dan, Dan South, Dan Beer-Sheva, Egged, Egged Taabura, Metropoline, Superbus, Elektra Afikim, Kavim, Tnufa, Nativ Express, Beit Shemesh Express UNBS, NTT, Galim & Rama.

Rav-Kav turns out cheaper? Top-up your Rav-Kav using your phone! Just tap & hold your Rav-kav card on the back of your phone, select the ticket you want, pay using all major credit and debit cards. tap again to complete the topup and you're ready for your next journey!

You can choose between credit value which is acceptable by all public transit operators in Israel, or a Daily, Weekly and Monthly passes according to the area of your travel.

Rav-Pass is an official public transportation payment app licensed by the Ministry of transportation in Israel.
Rav Kav top up required NFC support on your phone.

We'd love to hear your feedback support@ravpass.co.il

Safe journeys,
HopOn Rav-Pass Team
descriptionShort: The official app for public transportation payments in Israel

Use the price calculator in the app and find the best payment option for your ride:

Pay directly from your phone no cash and "smart" cards required, just take your phone to your next ride and scan the QR code on board.
With Rav-Pass you can pay for any train & bus ride in Israel and enjoy daily and monthly discounts without upfront payments. You can use the service for your Israel Railways train rides, Haifa's Carmelit & Metronit, Jerusalem light rail and bus rides across Israel with Dan, Dan South, Dan Beer-Sheva, Egged, Egged Taabura, Metropoline, Superbus, Elektra Afikim, Kavim, Tnufa, Nativ Express, Beit Shemesh Express UNBS, NTT, Galim & Rama.

Rav-Kav turns out cheaper? Top-up your Rav-Kav using your phone! Just tap & hold your Rav-kav card on the back of your phone, select the ticket you want, pay using all major credit and debit cards. tap again to complete the topup and you're ready for your next journey!

You can choose between credit value which is acceptable by all public transit operators in Israel, or a Daily, Weekly and Monthly passes according to the area of your travel.

Rav-Pass is an official public transportation payment app licensed by the Ministry of transportation in Israel.
Rav Kav top up required NFC support on your phone.

We'd love to hear your feedback support@ravpass.co.il

Safe journeys,
HopOn Rav-Pass Team

descriptionShort: The official app for public transportation payments in Israel

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Students of the 2022-2023 academic year: time to update your public transportation discount entitlement and enjoy 33% off for every ride paid from your phone!
Want more? Use your Rav-Kav card and topup Annual/Semesterial pass and get a bonus: 50% off stored value topups to use out side your pass zone.

title: Rav-Pass by HopOn הופאון רב-פס

creator: Hopon Mobility LTD
descriptionHtml:
Taking public transit rides has never been easier. Rav-Pass gives you the freedom to choose anyway you want to pay for your public transit rides in Israel!

Use the price calculator in the app and find the best payment option for your ride:

Pay directly from your phone no cash and "smart" cards required, just take your phone to your next ride and scan the QR code on board.
With Rav-Pass you can pay for any train & bus ride in Israel and enjoy daily and monthly discounts without upfront payments. You can use the service for your Israel Railways train rides, Haifa's Carmelit & Metronit, Jerusalem light rail and bus rides across Israel with Dan, Dan South, Dan Beer-Sheva, Egged, Egged Taabura, Metropoline, Superbus, Elektra Afikim, Kavim, Tnufa, Nativ Express, Beit Shemesh Express UNBS, NTT, Galim & Rama.

Rav-Kav turns out cheaper? Top-up your Rav-Kav using your phone! Just tap & hold your Rav-kav card on the back of your phone, select the ticket you want, pay using all major credit and debit cards. tap again to complete the topup and you're ready for your next journey!

You can choose between credit value which is acceptable by all public transit operators in Israel, or a Daily, Weekly and Monthly passes according to the area of your travel.

Rav-Pass is an official public transportation payment app licensed by the Ministry of transportation in Israel.
Rav Kav top up required NFC support on your phone.

We'd love to hear your feedback support@ravpass.co.il

Safe journeys,
HopOn Rav-Pass Team

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Tel-Aviv's light rail is here!
Tap on Menu -> Schedules & directions to plan your light rail trip.
To buy a ticket, choose "Light Rail / Carmelit / Cable car" on the Rav-Pass payment page, then choose number of passengers and approve the ride. If your destination is more than 15km away, we'll also ask you to choose your alighting station. when purchasing a ticket, you'll get a QR code for inspection and for opening the turn slides when entering/existing Tel-Aviv's underground stations.

descriptionShort: The official app for public transportation payments in Israel

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Tel-Aviv's light rail is here!
Tap on Menu -> Schedules & directions to plan your light rail trip.
To buy a ticket, choose "Light Rail / Carmelit / Cable car" on the Rav-Pass payment page, then choose number of passengers and approve the ride. If your destination is more than 15km away, we'll also ask you to choose your alighting station. when purchasing a ticket, you'll get a QR code for inspection and for opening the turn slides when entering/existing Tel-Aviv's underground stations.

title: Rav-Pass by HopOn הופאון רב-פס

creator: Hopon Mobility LTD
descriptionHtml:
Taking public transit rides has never been easier. Rav-Pass gives you the freedom to choose anyway you want to pay for your public transit rides in Israel!

Use the price calculator in the app and find the best payment option for your ride:

Pay directly from your phone no cash and "smart" cards required, just take your phone to your next ride and scan the QR code on board.
With Rav-Pass you can pay for any train & bus ride in Israel and enjoy daily and monthly discounts without upfront payments. You can use the service for your Israel Railways train rides, Haifa's Carmelit, Cable car & Metronit, Tel Aviv and Jerusalem's light rail and bus rides across Israel with Dan, Dan South, Dan Beer-Sheva, Egged, Egged Taabura, Metropoline, Superbus, Elektra Afikim, Kavim, Tnufa, Extra, Dankal, Kfir, Nativ Express, Beit Shemesh Express UNBS, NTT, Galim & Rama.

Rav-Kav turns out cheaper? Top-up your Rav-Kav using your phone! Just tap & hold your Rav-kav card on the back of your phone, select the ticket you want, pay using all major credit and debit cards. tap again to complete the topup and you're ready for your next journey!

You can choose between credit value which is acceptable by all public transit operators in Israel, or a Daily, Weekly and Monthly passes according to the area of your travel.

Rav-Pass is an official public transportation payment app licensed by the Ministry of transportation in Israel.
Rav Kav top up required NFC support on your phone.

We'd love to hear your feedback support@ravpass.co.il

Safe journeys,
HopOn Rav-Pass Team

Exciting news! we're bringing more benefits for seniors aged 67+ and for residents of eligible cities & streets.
Want to check if you're eligible based on where you live?
Simply go to “Discount profile” for mobile validation or Rav-Kav in the Profile section of the app, choose “Geographic”, enter your address, and get an instant answer.
Just turned 67? Amazing! Select the “Senior Citizen 67+” profile and enjoy free rides.
